newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-ILOG started at SoundView.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-ILOG started at SoundView.

text.p: -- SoundView Financial Group Inc analyst Kris Tuttle started coverage of ILOG with both short-term and long-term buy ratings on Wednesday.

-- Tuttle expects the company to lose $0.10 a share in fiscal 1997, earn $0.22 a share in fiscal 1998, and earn $0.14 a share in fiscal 1998 with fiscal 1998 earnings on a fully-taxed basis, according to a research report.
-- SoundView was a co-manager of ILOG's initial public offering in February. The stock went public at $11 a share.
-- Shares slipped 1/8 to 8-3/8 in early trading.
